name: 劉建宏
objective: 本課程內容包括：Android 應用程式開發環境與模擬器安裝、Android專案建立與結構、Activity、Intent和Intent Filter、使用者介面設計、Layout、Widget與使用者事件處理方法、Menu、Navigation、 Material Design、Broadcast Receivers、Services、資料儲存和SQLite、以及進階主題等。
schedule:
(Week 1)      Overview of Android Apps and Android Studio  
(Week 2)      The First Android App
(Week 3)      User Interface/Layout Editor
(Week 4)      Activities/Intents
(Week 5)      Debugging/Unit Testing
(Week 6)      Input Control/Menu/Picker 
(Week 7)      Menu/User Navigation
(Week 8)      RecyclerView
(Week 9)      Midterm Exam
(Week 10)     Material Design 
(Week 11)     Adaptive Layouts/UI Testing 
(Week 12)     AsyncTask/AsyncTaskLoader/Internet
(Week 13)     Service/Broadcast Receivers
(Week 14)     Alarm Manager/JobScheduler
(Week 15)     Shared Preferences/App Settings
(Week 16)     SQLite/Room
(Week 17)     Project Demo
(Week 18)     Project Demo
materials:
Google官方訓練教材：Android Developer Fundamentals (Version 2)

Android 程式設計入門、應用到精通，孫宏明，修訂第四版，碁峰，2018。
Android Programming: The Big Nerd Ranch Guide, Bill Phillips, Chris Stewart, and Kristin Marsicano, 3rd Edition, Big Nerd Ranch, 2017.
